This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experience. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $200, reflecting its true worth and the effort put into its creation. I trust that you will find it to be an excellent investment in yourself and your well-being. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
